Vampirtron:
     "Sorry," He said. "Another bit of programming that I am trying to rid myself of. You see, I'm something of a freak, I feed off other Transformers. I hate it, but I need to, it keeps me moving. I can explain all better when we reach your commander. But rest assured, you have nothing to fear from me, you took me in, I will only repay you in kindness."



---------------------------------
